```json
  {"question": "Where is the hypodense nodule located?", "answer": "In the right thyroid lobe."},
  {"question": "Which side is the right pulmonary artery located compared to the left pulmonary artery?", "answer": "The right pulmonary artery is located lateral to the left pulmonary artery."},
  {"question": "What is the vertical position of the multiple lymph nodes observed?", "answer": "They are located in the mediastinal, upper-lower paratracheal, aorticopulmonary window, prevascular area, and subcarinal area."},

  {"question": "What is the spatial extent of the parenchymal fibrosis areas observed in the lungs?", "answer": "They are present in both lungs."},
  {"question": "Where are the subcapsular parenchymal calcifications located in relation to the liver?", "answer": "In the posterior right lobe of the liver."},
  {"question": "What is the relationship of the trachea to the main bronchi?", "answer": "The trachea is anterior to the lumen of both main bronchi."},
  {"question": "Are the peribronchial thickenings confined to one lung or present in both?", "answer": "They are present in both lungs."},
  {"question": "What is the position of the thoracic esophagus in relation to the aorta?", "answer": "The thoracic esophagus is medial to the aorta."},
  {"question": "How does the size of the heart compare to normal size?", "answer": "The heart size is increased."}
]
```
